33030.affected_area: Alberta, Moosejaw and Swift Current Area
live_updates: Around 80% of customers service has been restored. For those who remain we ask for your continued patience as we finish this refresh process. Thank you.

The refresh of affected equipment is continuing. Many customers services has already been restored yet many more are still affected. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your continued patience.

The refresh of affected equipment is continuing. Many customers services has already been restored yet many more are still affected. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your continued patience.

Teams are currently working through refreshes of affected equipment. Most customers should see services come back online on their own.  Please check the box from time to time to see if services have been restored.  We will provide further updates as we get them.
We are working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
33030.summary: Some customers in Alberta, Moosejaw and Swift Current Area are experiencing a Black Screen or a Subscription message can refresh your cable boxes using the myshaw app or by visiting my.shaw.ca. We are working to resolve this as soon as possible. For instructions on performing a reset please visit
33030.title: Feb 5 –  Alberta, Moosejaw and Swift Current Area| Black Screen or Subscription Message - Outage (Fix in Progress)
